# Flame (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** You can generate a *flame ward*, a spell-like ability to grant yourself or someone you touch a resistance bonus equal to your shaman level on all saving throws against fire spells and effects. Activating this power is a standard action. The *flame ward* is an abjuration effect with a duration of 1 minute + 1 minute/level that is usable once per day.

**Flame Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Burning Hands (Spell)|Burning Hands]]****:** 1d4 fire damage/level (max 5d4).

**2** **[[Produce Flame (Spell)|Produce Flame]]****:** 1d4 +1/two levels damage, touch or thrown.

**3** **[[Animate Fire (Spell)|Animate Fire]]****:** Turn campfire into Small elemental.

**4** **[[Wall of Fire (Spell)|Wall of Fire]]****:** Deals 2d4 fire damage out to 10 ft. and 1d4 out to 20 ft. Passing through wall deals 2d6 +1/level.

**5** **[[Fire Breath, Greater (Spell)|Fire Breath]]****:** You can breathe fire once/round; flame deals 1d8/two levels (maximum 10d8) damage to one target within 15 ft.

**6** **[[Fire Seeds (Spell)|Fire Seeds]]****:** Acorns and berries become grenades and bombs.

**7** **[[Fire Storm (Spell)|Fire Storm]]****:** Deals 1d6 fire damage/level.

**8** **[[Incendiary Cloud (Spell)|Incendiary Cloud]]****:** Cloud deals 4d6 fire damage/round.

**9** **[[Internal Fire (Spell)|Internal Fire]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Targets die instantly or take 6d6 + 1/level fire damage.
